alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 8:26AM CST until January 19 at 3:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW DIMINISHING FROM SOUTH TO NORTH TODAY... .A Low pressure system centered over northwest Illinois this morning will track to central Lower Michigan by mid-afternoon. The primary snow band with the storm was over northern Wisconsin at 800 am, and will shift into Upper Michigan during the mid to late morning. Lighter snow as well as some drizzle and freezing drizzle will continue in the wake of the main snow band. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle. Up to an additional inch of snow accumulation expected, along with minor icing. * WHERE...Portage, Waushara, Wood, and Waupaca Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected.
info.instruction: Be sure to allow for plenty of extra travel time. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
